# Scholastic Achievements
* Among the top 0.1% students in the Joint Entrance Examination (JEE) out of 15,00,000 candidates who appeared for the exam. (2015)
* Among top 1% students selected in Indian National Chemistry Olympiad (INChO). (2015)
* Among top 1% students selected in Indian National Astronomy Olympiad (INAO). (2015)
* Secured 99.77 percentile rank in Mathematics in Student Talent Search Test conducted by
* Gujarat Secondary and Higher Secondary Education Board (GSEB). (2011)
* Awarded Special Prize in Maharashtra Talent Search Examination (MTSE) for commendable
* performance. (2011)
* Awarded Scholarship in the Max New York Life Igenius Exam for meritorious performance
* for two consecutive years. (2010 and 2011)
* Reached 2nd round in Australian National Chemistry Quiz in Junior Division with Distinction
* performance in the 1st round, conducted by Royal Australian Chemical Institute. (2011)


# Projects Undertaken
1. **Velocity of a moving object using Photodarlington**(_Oct_ 2016)  
_Course Project, IIT-Bombay_  
-Built a circuit that allows to compute the velocity of a moving object using photodarlingtons.  
-Used RS latches to start and stop the timer count as and when the IR light got blocked by the moving object.  
-Used RC circuit as a timer to get accurate readings.

2. **Magnus Plane | Institute Technical Summer Project (ITSP)** (_May_ 2016-present)  
_Aero modelling Club, STAB, IIT-Bombay_  
-Designed and conceptualized a plane which flies in the air due to magnus effect generated
by two pair of rotating cylinders.  

3. **Wearable device for easy ECG measurement |TATA Pro Engage Project** (_Jul’_ 2016-present)  
_IIT-Bombay_  
-Innovative way of monitoring ECG and other heart related information.  
-A smart way to capture patients ECG and report it to a cloud platform.  
-Execute a doctor's login portal with registration number validation to maintain records.  

4. **Water Harvesting Project | Inter-school Science Project Competition** (2012)  
_St. Xavier’s High School, Surat_  
-Designed a cost effective working model to utilize the rainwater effectively and storing it for
daily chores and future use.  
-Main motto : Conservation of Natural Resources.  
-Secured second position as a Student Scientist in Interschool Project Competition.  

5. **Oil Spill Management Project | Inter-school Science Project Competition** (2011)  
_St. Xavier’s High School, Surat_  
-Designed a cost effective waste to best model to remove spilled oil from large water bodies.  
-Based on the viscosity difference principle of oil and water.
